name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_234U
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "U" means the element "uranium" and "234U" is the isotope "uranium-234" with a half-life of 9.02e+07 days.
